short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: helps to preview the markdown while creating a markdown gist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The option is visible only when you choose the filetype as markdown or your filename ends with .md

* updated for latest changes in gist.github.com design
